column3: â€œGreat sativa dominant strain for indica lovers. Definitely a favorite hybrid. Ups the appetite as well.â€

â€œJack Herer X DJ Short Blueberry.  This is truly one special strain. Blueburrry Jack I got it on with was 20.03%thc, 20.4%CBD. Pretty amazing numbers, rare to have 20%CBD alone, very rare to have +20% on both.

Listen, the stank-so-good, irresistible, piney smell of Jack Herer with the fruity berry aroma from Dj Short Blueberry mesh seemlessly.

A subtly sweet, piney, dominatently Blueberry flavor, my taste buds were ...â€
â€œThe cut I got of this, probably had the highest THC content of any cannabis I've ever tried. They call it Blueberry" Jack
column4: but the emphasis is "Jack" as it has the best traits of that mythical strain. At first glance
column5: it's pure Jack Herer. But closer inspection shows densely packed buds
column6: just saturated in brown trichrome strands. The aroma is fruity and sexy
column7: the taste is mildly spicy. The last thing you'll taste th...â€"

column3: â€œBought a gram at AZ Natural Selections of Scottsdale. Incredibly sweet smelling and dark green buds with a piney undertone, very frosty with keef and a dense cone structure. Taste is much more piney than the smell, but still very sweet. High is very heady, incredibly clear and high energy. A nice sativa undertone keeps you from feeling any anxiety. Great for enjoying any activity, would definitely buy more than a gra...â€

â€œBottom line concerning this strain is there is not enough of that classic sativa high for my preferences. May work well for those with social anxiety, because of its clear heady high and not much angst throughout the dosing. I gave this strain 4 stars because of the presentation; one of the best smelling strains out there.â€
â€œi smoked more than i should have, this strain took me to another planet.  be weary first timers.â€
â€œThe taste of this strain was excellent.  So far all of the flower I got from AZ Natural Selections has been A1. I will be back soon for the great service and meds.â€
â€œI could not have said it better Kaliskunk! It is truely a unique strain with wonderful atributes!â€

â€œMy go to strain when I'm down in the rabbit hole". Picks you right up and lifts your spirt. A must try for anyone with anxiety/depression issues.â€"

â€œExcellent any time of the day strain. First of the bud structure was dense, large, pointy buds. So the Jack makes himself known even in appearance. DJ shorts Blueberry shows in the large roundness of the buds and the immediate smell & taste. 2 great strains paired nicely. Essentially I'm a Indica smoker but will try to always keep some of this around and make sure to grab it up when it's around. High thc & cbd which ...â€
â€œ3rd session with this one. Still a relaxing up feeling, but man. Hella munchies.â€
â€œExcellent medicinal effect as well as potency. Ratios are closely leveled . A must grab and keep to clone highly recommended if you come across it.â€

â€œFun, but intense with an overwhelming head high that completely disables your ability to think constructively. Absorbing stuff and engaging with people is constantly intriguing and fun! Power of the high is a bit challenging, but fun for those with experience. Itâ€™s got a light, easy going view on life, but there is potential for edginess (thanks, Jack). Not much physical relaxation - in fact, the opposite - feel a bi...â€

â€œThis definitely got me giggly and happy. My friend and I could not stop laughing. I felt pretty active and excited! I felt a little anxious however it calms down after a few minutes. Something I can keep smoking but it eventually made me feel tired enough to go to sleep.â€

â€œINTENSE. This is a great strain that will make you feel fantastic but be warned that it's slow to start and may creep up on you. Taking too many hits at once is a surefire way to go to outer space.

Also, it gives you mega munchies.â€

VERY NICEâ€

Great clear headed influence that give you energy to walk and do what you want with a taste upgrade compared to his father jackâ€

â€œBlueberry Jack is a Sativa Hybrid (80/20) cross of Blueberry X Jack Herer X Northern Lights #5. Really an amazing medicine considering it's long flower cycle. 
Smell: Candy sweet, piney.
Taste: Just like blueberries! (Left resin on my lips!)
Flowering: 60-70 Days
Yeild: Medium to High. 

If you can find a Blueberry Jack clone, its a must have. Really high THC% & CBD% strain.

Found in the Bay Area.â€
â€œOne of my favorite hybrids. The sativa effects of this bud are amazing. Left me happy, uplifted, and very satisfied. Top 3 Hybrid.â€
â€œThis was an alright strain.  It left me a little spacey and disconnected and I didn't enjoy coming down off of it.  Not for me.  Heady high with a body stone but it's just a little too much.â€
â€œGot the strain by sub x. 14% thc. It was very mellow effects. It looks, tastes, and smells unbelievable.â€

â€œFirst off 4.5 is my rating. I first purchased this fantastic strain from Az natural selections. I took a dab of blueberry jack wax today. It motivated to go out and catch Pokemon while maintaining that great high it gives you. Blueberry jack is amazing four point five starsâ€
â€œHad sannie's JackBerry the exact same cross of the DJ short original Indica Blueberry was used. Liked it not loved it so 4 stars would smoke again if I came across itâ€
â€œIt's a nice high, it doesn't stick you to the couch and leaves with enough energy to still be productive.â€
â€œI love this it's a very uplifting feeling. It doesn't take much to make you feel good.â€
â€œI love this so uplifting.â€

â€œWow! As a frequent smoker, this strain kicked me right in the giggles. Great head high. Made me feel happy, giggly, and carefree. So depression is a goner. The bud has a great sweet smell and good taste. Love this one!â€

â€œHad a really long week at work and couldnâ€™t wait to get home to toke. I was extremely tired, stressed and frustrated! Picked up an oz of Blueberry Jack for an amazing price! Nice buds with a really nice nose. Had two big bowls within seconds of walking in my door. Had an immediate rush of energy and increased heart rate. Absolutely did its job of putting me in a better mood.â€

Definitely recommend staying home and being productive there!â€
